body:
About time I introduce myself I guess. I joined over a year ago, but never really communicated on the forums. I play from time to time, but have slowly started to find more interest in Avicus. Many of you may know me from OCN. I'm also a ref there.

So as this is an introduction thread, I'll throw in an AMA as well. Feel free to shoot the questions!
body_tagged:

title: Hi. I'm Crazy - AMA

replies.body:
More new players?!?!?!

Welcome to Avicus, hope you enjoy your stay here! Remember to ask Petlas to bake you some cookies.
replies.body_tagged:
More new players?!?!?!

Welcome to Avicus, hope you enjoy your stay here! Remember to ask Petlas to bake you some cookies.

replies.body: Also, if anyone could help me, I'm not sure what this means. The email part
replies.body_tagged: Also, if anyone could help me, I'm not sure what this means. The email part

replies.body:
As far as I am aware, you need to have the same email for Gravatar and Avicus. If you fill in the email slot, you should have a confirmed email. (Did this a while ago, I can't recall correctly). 

For example, this is the email I use for both Gravatar and Avicus. If you contact me on slack, we'll figure it out \o/


AMA wise - Enjoying Ref so far?

replies.body: Hey Crazy, I saw you in game earlier! It's cool to see you here, and I hope you enjoy your time.

replies.body: Crazy my smp buddy, but you have power than me because you're the owner :c

replies.body: Welcome Crazy, I recognize you from OCN. Hope you enjoy it here. Feel free to ask me any questions you might have.

replies.body: It's great. I get this shiny blue badge, which is incredibly sexy

replies.body:
Ayy, I recognize ya from OCN! Welcome ;3

What are your future plans on OCN/Avicus/IRL? ;o
replies.body_tagged:
Ayy, I recognize ya from OCN! Welcome ;3

What are your future plans on OCN/Avicus/IRL? ;o

replies.body:
Idk. I'm going to ref for OCN for a while. OCN's gotten to the point where I pretty much just derp around with friends. So I've come here and stuff. I'd love to try out an Avicus tourney sometime in the future.

As for IRL, I plan on taking my drivers test soon.


EDIT: Gawd, this is so weird not to see a purple tag next to my name. Ooooo, I spend too much time on the OCN forums
